author: Justin Phillips
comment: Of all of the watch faces I own, I use this one the most. As a Moto 360 user, I find many faces are designed for a completely circular watch, so part of the watch face is blocked by the "flat tire". This face has a Moto 360 mode which flattens out @ the 6 o'clock position so the face is intact. It also has several color scheme, so I can coordinate with what I'm wearing or choose a scheme to suit mood or the occasion. Well worth the price, particularly for Moto 360 owners.
title: Best Watch Face for Android Wear

author: Kalen Rixon
comment: The right side of the screen is cut off on the moto 360 v2. Will rate at 5 stars once this is fixed. Tried rebooting and reinstalling to no avail.
title: Right 15% cut off on Moto 360 v2

author: Jaimee Kidder
comment: Beautiful watch face, but a large chunk of the right side is cut off on my Moto 360 v2...sort of like an extra "flat tire" effect on the right side.  This would be a five star watch face if not for this issue.

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: This is my new favorite watch face! It looks great on my G Watch R and the ambient mode options are perfect! Too many watch faces don't put any thought into ambient mode, so it's great to see this one actually look great in ambient. Keep up the good work!
title: Fantastic!

author: Bad Fish
comment: Unfortunately it looks terrible on Huawei Watch.
title: Huawei Watch compatibility

author: Michael Smith
comment: Huawei watch. Bottom and right side are cut off no matter what I do. The colors are also not as vibrant as the pictures and are super dull. Will try to contact to get a fix/answer
title: Right side & btw cutt off

author: Dave Zhang
comment: The only thing that would make this face perfect is if the rotation animation was also enabled for those of us that choose not to use an always-on screen
title: Excellent!

author: Joseph Allen
comment: I downloaded it thinking mehhh I'll probably get a refund after I play with it. WRONG. this is absolutely beautiful. Even on the ambient mode. Absolutely beautiful. Definitely keeping it.

author: Brad Huscroft
comment: ...all of the moneys.
title: Shut up and take my money...

author: iamdk44
comment: Bought it without regret. And plus, it didn't disappoint me. Thanks!
title: Totally worth it.

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: Lots of settings and numbers that aren't too thin (although still relatively small).
title: Lots of settings

author: Alex Recio
comment: Looks great. I use this as my everyday watch face on my moto 360.

author: Adam Munn-Rivard
comment: I love your style... Great work.
title: Perfect watch face

author: Isaac Cloud
comment: Great design. Love the color options.

author: Scott Welch
comment: Gorgeous watch face

author: Lucas Corrigan
comment: I love this watchface but currently on my moto 360 v2 there is a chunk missing from the right side of the screen making it unusable for me. If this is fixed I will repurchase in an instant. Please fix asap!
title: Right chunk of screen cut off

author: Travis Malcuit
comment: It isn't formatted correctly and cuts off the day and part of the hour numbers.
title: Doesn't work right on huawei watch

author: Raymond Williams
comment: Doesn't work well with Moto 360 2nd Gen, 42mm.

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Broken on the Huawei Watch. Cuts off the bottom portion of the face.

author: John Khtaria
comment: Please add Huawei watch support, otherwise great face.
title: Does not work on Huawei watch
